title: SFS App & API
description: An unofficial app that allowed students to check their grades in an easy and intuitive way compared to the TeacherEase website, as well as the server side API to retrieve the info.

title: InfiniGrow
description: An endless runner for Windows and Android where you try to escape sheeple. Created in three days using GameMaker: Studio for Ludum Dare 34 and made it into the top 1000 overall!

title: nPlay
description: A website that at one point allowed users to watch videos together on YouTube and other video streaming services. nPlay utilized the Spark framework and Pug.

title: nNinja
description: A sweet Ninja platformer that was in the works, featuring tile-based levels and a fully functional level editor.

title: The Spooky Dungeon
description: A revolutionary graphical RPG with online multiplayer and an incredibly large amount of text! This game was created for an AP Computer Science course and updated after submission with additional features.

title: Fe
description: An economy plugin for Minecraft! Fe supported SQLite and MySQL database engines and implemented the Vault API to seamlessly integrate with other plugins.

title: Music Bot
description: A Teamspeak music bot written in Java with the Spark framework

title: nicholasnassar.com
description: The website you are currently on! Uses Java, Vert.x, and Pug as well as Material Design Lite so everything looks good.

title: nRPG
description: A huge Minecraft modification that adds in classes, skills, dungeons, and custom items into the game

title: IMBAbuilds Android App
description: The official app for IMBAbuilds that allows you to browse Starcraft II builds!
